title: Patch 7.21 with bugs and huge lag
body:
Has anyone else been experiencing these issues today?
- Weird bug where all health bars go down a lot when you first look at them
- Client being slow and pretty laggy
- In game having huge lag like casting abilities taking ages to do or not casting at all after pressing the button (past two games a lot of my teammates and opponents told me they are experiencing the same thing)

I hope riot sees this and does something about it, thanks!

replies.body: Do you guys happen to play on the mac client?
I dunno bout the others but not me no. running windows 7. I still have this issue as well.

I've seen a lot of players having some weird packet loss issues around this time. If you're still having all this problems, do me a favor and grab a tool like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a traceroute to the EUW servers at 192.64.170.252. Copy what it gives you and post it here so I can take a look. I should be able to see where your connection is hitting it's rough spot that way.

Hope this helps:
>tracert 192.64.170.252

Tracing route to 192.64.170.252 over a maximum of 30 hops

  1    <1 ms    <1 ms    <1 ms  router.asus.com [192.168.9.1]
  2    <1 ms     1 ms     1 ms  192.168.1.1
  3     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  4    33 ms    19 ms    26 ms  10.253.129.2
  5     *        *        *     Request timed out.
  6    30 ms    88 ms    19 ms  10.253.131.2
  7    28 ms    18 ms    14 ms  192.168.107.9
  8    33 ms    16 ms    18 ms  192.168.106.249
  9   149 ms    24 ms    23 ms  151.248.98.193
 10    93 ms    81 ms    77 ms  151.248.96.145
 11    89 ms    76 ms    82 ms  62.67.38.53.l3serial.fft1.eu.Level3.net [62.67.38.53]
 12     *        *      665 ms  ae-2-3602.ear3.Washington1.Level3.net [4.69.206.81]
 13   183 ms   181 ms   182 ms  4.16.252.202
 14     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 15     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 16     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 17     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 18     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 19     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 20     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 21     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 22     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 23     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 24     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 25     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 26     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 27     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 28     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 29     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 30     *        *        *     Request timed out.

Trace complete.

So this line here.....

> 12 665 ms ae-2-3602.ear3.Washington1.Level3.net [4.69.206.81]

is saying that your connection is hitting a pretty bad rough spot when it hits that Level3 node. Sounds like Level3 might be your ISP or something that works with them, so I'd suggest giving them this info if you're still having issues so they can look into what's going wrong!

yes im really suffering with the new patch lately. since 2 days the client takes a lot of time to sign in then it doesnt load most of the content on home screen and i have to press "play" multiple times to work and then most importantly in game i keep spiking and jittering really hard even though my pin of around 100 was always perfectly fine before this patch and since specifically 2 days

Im having the same but all my other friends didnt except for one other friend who played hecarim dont think thats the issue.

But i have 20 ping  and 168 fps everything is fine but i cant even properly select my masteries before the game and in game everything like laggy.

Nothing goes off or everything is really really late i did a full repair but its still the same.

Just commenting to help you brothers out cause this is unplayable.

#help us rito

yes,same here ,the ping seems fine arround 19-25,fps 150-200,but getting huge lag ,and very often dc from the game for no reason,and sometimes cant even log to the game client,everything happends since the new patch 7.21,(have tried :install the "lag fix",reboot router,change dns,reinstall the game,but they didnt help) there is absolutely something wrong with the new patch.this game is becoming progressively worse after each new patch.to be honestly
Having the same issue here. Strange, since I was playing with friends who all did not experience it.
Apart from the health bar thing, we all had that
Yes. the lag especially is irritating in the extreme, just played a game as kayn where I hit q 12 times before dying to a vayne without using my q or doing any damage at all. (quickcast was on)
